newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass licenses technology to PowerTV.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass licenses technology to PowerTV.

text.p: Spyglass Inc, as expected, said Monday that PowerTV Inc is licensing Spyglass' Client Software Development Kit (SDK) technology.
PowerTV, a leading provider of software and hardware solutions for interactive entertainment, will take components from the Spyglass Client SDK to make its operating system work on the Internet.
The license agreement for Internet technology between Spyglass and PowerTv was reported by Reuters on November 1, quoting a source close to the deal.
PowerTV's operating system is currently used in interactive networks from BellSouth Corp and Pacific Telesis Group.
